languages.text: "Губернатор пребывает под надежной защитой укрепленных бункеров... как и прочие главы дворянских родов". {n}Клеменциа со скрипом сжимает зубы.{/n} "Впрочем, каждое семейство предоставило все доступные им ресурсы для обороны Даргонуса — точнее, принадлежащих им регионов".

traits.locale_text: "Губернатор пребывает под надежной защитой укрепленных бункеров... как и прочие главы дворянских родов". {n}Клеменциа со скрипом сжимает зубы.{/n} "Впрочем, каждое семейство предоставило все доступные им ресурсы для обороны Даргонуса — точнее, принадлежащих им регионов".

languages.text: "The governor is currently protected within a well-fortified bunker... as are the heads of the other noble houses." {n}Clementia grinds her teeth audibly.{/n} "Still, each family has provided all available resources to the defence of Dargonus — or rather, the defence of their respective regions."
languages.original_text: "Губернатор пребывает под надежной защитой укрепленных бункеров... как и прочие главы дворянских родов". {n}Клеменциа со скрипом сжимает зубы.{/n} "Впрочем, каждое семейство предоставило все доступные им ресурсы для обороны Даргонуса — точнее, принадлежащих им регионов".

traits.locale_text: "The governor is currently under the protection of well-fortified bunkers... as are the other leaders of noble houses." {n}Clementia grinds her teeth audibly.{/n} "Still, each family has provided all available resources to the defense of Dargonus — or rather, the defense of their respective regions."

"The governor is currently under the protection of well-fortified bunkers... as are the other leaders of noble houses." {n}Clementia grinds her teeth audibly.{/n} "Still, each family has provided all available resources to the defense of Dargonus — or rather, the defense of their respective regions."

"The governor is currently protected within a well-fortified bunker... as are the heads of the other noble houses." {n}Clementia grinds her teeth audibly.{/n} "Still, each family has provided all available resources to the defence of Dargonus — or rather, the defence of their respective regions."

"The governor is currently protected within a well-fortified bunker... as are the heads of the other noble houses." {n}Clementia grinds her teeth audibly.{/n} "Still, each family has provided all available resources to the defence of Dargonus — or rather, the defence of their respective regions."

"The governor is currently protected within a well-fortified bunker... as are the heads of the other noble houses." {n}Clementia grinds her teeth audibly.{/n} "Still, each family has provided all available resources to the defence of Dargonus — or rather, the defence of their respective regions."

languages.text: 「総督は現在、要塞化されたバンカーに避難されてます…他の貴族家系も同様です」{n}クレメンティアはこちらにも聞こえるほど強く歯を食いしばった。{/n}「それでも、各家はダルゴナスの防衛―いえ、それぞれの管轄地域の防衛のために、使える資源はすべて提供しました」
languages.original_text: "The governor is currently protected within a well-fortified bunker... as are the heads of the other noble houses." {n}Clementia grinds her teeth audibly.{/n} "Still, each family has provided all available resources to the defence of Dargonus — or rather, the defence of their respective regions."

traits.locale_text: 「総督は現在、要塞化されたバンカーに避難されてます…他の貴族家系も同様です」{n}クレメンティアはこちらにも聞こえるほど強く歯を食いしばった。{/n}「それでも、各家はダルゴナスの防衛―いえ、それぞれの管轄地域の防衛のために、使える資源はすべて提供しました」

languages.text: “总督大人此刻正躲在戒备森严的地堡里……其他贵族家族的首领也同样如此。”{n}克莱门缇雅咬得牙齿格格作响。{/n}“当然，这些贵族家族已经竭尽所能地提供资源，来保卫达戈努斯。或者更确切地说，保卫他们各自的属地。”
languages.original_text: "The governor is currently protected within a well-fortified bunker... as are the heads of the other noble houses." {n}Clementia grinds her teeth audibly.{/n} "Still, each family has provided all available resources to the defence of Dargonus — or rather, the defence of their respective regions."

traits.locale_text: “总督大人此刻正躲在戒备森严的地堡里……其他贵族家族的首领也同样如此。”{n}克莱门缇雅咬得牙齿格格作响。{/n}“当然，这些贵族家族已经竭尽所能地提供资源，来保卫达戈努斯。或者更确切地说，保卫他们各自的属地。”

languages.text: «El gobernador está protegido en un búnker fortificado... al igual que los líderes de las otras casas nobles». {n}Clementia hace rechinar los dientes.{/n} «Sin embargo, cada familia ha asignado todos los recursos disponibles para la defensa de Dargonus. Bueno, para la defensa de sus respectivas regiones».
languages.original_text: "The governor is currently protected within a well-fortified bunker... as are the heads of the other noble houses." {n}Clementia grinds her teeth audibly.{/n} "Still, each family has provided all available resources to the defence of Dargonus — or rather, the defence of their respective regions."

traits.locale_text: «El gobernador está protegido en un búnker fortificado... al igual que los líderes de las otras casas nobles». {n}Clementia hace rechinar los dientes.{/n} «Sin embargo, cada familia ha asignado todos los recursos disponibles para la defensa de Dargonus. Bueno, para la defensa de sus respectivas regiones».

languages.text: « Le gouverneur est à l'abri dans un bunker fortifié... tout comme les dirigeants des autres familles nobles, {n}explique Clémentia en grinçant des dents.{/n} Mais chaque famille a mis toutes ses ressources à disposition pour assurer la défense de Dargonus. Enfin, plutôt la défense de leurs régions respectives. »
languages.original_text: "The governor is currently protected within a well-fortified bunker... as are the heads of the other noble houses." {n}Clementia grinds her teeth audibly.{/n} "Still, each family has provided all available resources to the defence of Dargonus — or rather, the defence of their respective regions."

traits.locale_text: « Le gouverneur est à l'abri dans un bunker fortifié... tout comme les dirigeants des autres familles nobles, {n}explique Clémentia en grinçant des dents.{/n} Mais chaque famille a mis toutes ses ressources à disposition pour assurer la défense de Dargonus. Enfin, plutôt la défense de leurs régions respectives. »

languages.text: "Der Gouverneur befindet sich derzeit in einem gut befestigten Bunker in Sicherheit ... genau wie die Oberhäupter der übrigen Adelshäuser." {n}Clementia knirscht hörbar mit den Zähnen.{/n} "Immerhin hat jede Familie alle verfügbaren Ressourcen zur Verteidigung von Dargonus zur Verfügung gestellt – oder besser, zur Verteidigung ihrer jeweiligen Regionen."
languages.original_text: "The governor is currently protected within a well-fortified bunker... as are the heads of the other noble houses." {n}Clementia grinds her teeth audibly.{/n} "Still, each family has provided all available resources to the defence of Dargonus — or rather, the defence of their respective regions."

traits.locale_text: "Der Gouverneur befindet sich derzeit in einem gut befestigten Bunker in Sicherheit ... genau wie die Oberhäupter der übrigen Adelshäuser." {n}Clementia knirscht hörbar mit den Zähnen.{/n} "Immerhin hat jede Familie alle verfügbaren Ressourcen zur Verteidigung von Dargonus zur Verfügung gestellt – oder besser, zur Verteidigung ihrer jeweiligen Regionen."

languages.text: "Vali, müstahkem bir sığınakta muhafaza ediliyor... Diğer soylu hanelerin önderleri de öyle." {n}Clementia, duyulur şekilde dişlerini gıcırdatıyor.{/n} "Öte yandan her hane, Dargonus'un, daha doğrusu kendi topraklarının savunulması için ellerindeki tüm kaynakları teslim etti."
languages.original_text: "The governor is currently protected within a well-fortified bunker... as are the heads of the other noble houses." {n}Clementia grinds her teeth audibly.{/n} "Still, each family has provided all available resources to the defence of Dargonus — or rather, the defence of their respective regions."

traits.locale_text: "Vali efendi müstahkem bir sığınakta muhafaza ediliyor... Diğer soylu hanelerin önderleri de öyle.” {n}Clementia, sesli bir şekilde dişlerini gıcırdatıyor.{/n} "Öte yandan her hane, ellerindeki tüm kaynakları Dargonus’un; ya da kendi topraklarının savunulması için teslim etti."
